name: Tower Rancher
description:
Ludum Dare 41 - Combine 2 incompatible Genres

Genre : Tower Defense/Pet Sim

Tower Rancher is about defending a village by raising a pet tower to be the best it can be. Use a variety of training minigames over 10 days to increase your tower's stats and then send it valiantly into battle as it defends against 4 waves of various baddies. 

If your first tower doesn't succeed, don't worry! You'll be able to raise 4 more to help it fight, before the oldest one needs to be replaced. 

Controls : 

LMB to click on various UI

Escape to bring up options menu

Everything else is explained in-game!

Have fun.
